info.title: Important Information
info: A category B driver's license is required for quad riding

Minimum 2, maximum 4 quads can be rented per tour (+passengers)
Weather-dependent program: in extreme conditions, rescheduling is possible

instructions.title: How Does It Work?
items: Select a date – The calendar automatically displays available and booked dates. Greyed-out days are unavailable.
Select your tour type – Decide which tour you want to join. If unsure, check the Tours section.
Specify the number of quads and passengers – At least 2 quads must be rented, but up to 4 can be booked at once. Passenger numbers are separately adjustable.
Provide additional information – If you have any special requests or comments, enter them in the last field.

info.title: Additional Booking Information:
items: Payment is required to finalize your booking.
After payment, you will receive a confirmation email within minutes.
If you cannot attend your booked session and do not notify us at least a week in advance, we cannot refund the payment.
Please arrive on time at the designated location to ensure a smooth experience!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

accordions.question: How does booking and payment work?
accordions.answer: Booking can be done online or by phone. The tour fee must be paid in advance, but if you need to reschedule, we handle modifications flexibly.

accordions.question: Is a driver's license required to operate a quad?
accordions.answer: Yes, participation in the tours requires a category B driver's license, as the quad bikes' engine power and performance demand it.

accordions.question: What is the minimum age requirement for the tour?
accordions.answer: A minimum age of 18 and a valid driver's license are required to operate a quad. For passengers, a height of at least 160 cm is recommended.

accordions.question: What is the minimum number of participants for a tour?
accordions.answer: Tours require a minimum of 2 participants but can accommodate larger groups as well. It is recommended to inform us in advance about the number of participants during booking.

accordions.question: Can I take a passenger on the quad?
accordions.answer: Yes, but it's important that the passenger's weight and height do not negatively affect the driving experience and safety. Riding with a passenger may incur an additional fee.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Experience and passion in guided tours – get to know us!
hero.body:
Discover how our business started, what services we offer, and meet our team!
Whether it's a fun getaway with friends, a team-building event, or an exciting weekend adventure, we guarantee freedom and adrenaline!

items.title: Professionally Guided Tours
items.text:
We offer guided quad tours that take you through exciting off-road terrains, all the way to the geographical center of Hungary. Whether you are a beginner looking to try this unique experience for the first time or an experienced rider searching for an adrenaline-filled challenge, our tours are designed to be safe, enjoyable, and unforgettable.

Every tour is carefully planned to provide the perfect balance of adventure and exploration. Our experienced guides ensure that you can confidently and comfortably control the quad. With well-maintained vehicles, breathtaking routes, and our passion for off-road riding, we guarantee that this experience will be truly one of a kind!

items.title: Safety and Expertise First
items.text: Our tours are led by experienced guides who know the terrain inside out and strictly follow all necessary safety regulations. Participants receive a detailed briefing on how to handle the quads, and protective gear is provided when needed. Our goal is to ensure that every adventure is both thrilling and completely safe for all participants.

items.title: Unique Routes, Stunning Landscapes
items.text: During our tours, we traverse a variety of terrains that guarantee both excitement and challenges for beginners and experienced riders alike. Forest trails, open fields, sandy paths, and dirt roads—everyone can find the perfect challenge that suits their pace.

items.title: Personalized Experience with Full Attention
items.text: Our tours are not rushed, conveyor-belt experiences! We prioritize providing the best possible experience for each participant, which is why we operate in small groups and always adapt to the skill level and preferences of our riders. If you have questions, need assistance, or just want a little extra time to enjoy the ride, you’ll never feel pressured here!

profiles.name: Péter Hau
profiles.bio:
My name is Péter Hau. Since childhood, I have been passionate about motorsports, especially motocross and quads. As a young rider, I spent countless hours exploring nature and the most exciting terrains around Lajosmizse on two and four wheels. In recent years, I worked in Austria as a professional quad tour guide, where I had the opportunity to lead hundreds of tours and introduce thousands of people to the thrill of off-road riding.

These years have taught me a lot—how to ensure safe yet exciting tours, how to adapt to different clients' needs, and how to make every tour a unique experience. Now, I have brought this knowledge home to create a quad tour service in the heart of Hungary, around the beautiful Pusztavacs area, offering unforgettable adventures for both beginners and experienced riders alike.

If you've ever wanted to try quad biking or are looking for a unique experience, you're in the right place. My goal is to provide confidence and enjoyment to all my guests on the terrain—whether they’re sitting on a quad for the first time or are already seasoned riders. I look forward to welcoming you on an adrenaline-filled, unforgettable tour!

profiles.name: Krisztina Sós
profiles.bio:
For me, customer relationships have always been a personal matter. I believe that a great service is not just about the experience itself, but the entire process—from the very first inquiry to the post-tour feedback.

My job is to ensure that every potential customer receives the necessary information quickly and accurately, assist with bookings, and make sure all details are clear before the tour. I know that for many, this is their first time on a quad, so I provide patience and enthusiasm to help everyone feel confident before their adventure.

If you have any questions regarding bookings, available dates, or tour details, don’t hesitate to reach out! My goal is to make sure that even before your tour begins, you already have a positive experience!

profiles.name: Mátyás Orosz
profiles.bio:
I have always loved nature, off-road riding, and the sense of freedom that a quad provides. I have been an off-road tour guide for several years, and my goal is to offer a safe yet challenging adventure for every participant.

During the tours, I not only have a deep knowledge of the routes and technical aspects but also know how to help beginners quickly gain confidence on the quad. It's important to me that every rider feels comfortable and excited about the journey. So, if you have any questions or uncertainties, feel free to ask—I’m here to help!

On the terrain, I always look out for you and ensure that everyone moves at their own pace. Whether you prefer a relaxed ride or an adrenaline-filled adventure, you can be sure that you’ll go home with an unforgettable experience!
